name: Naming convention prefix on Messages Nodes (PeopleSoft)
description: The naming convention check is designed to identify the prefix and suffix corresponding to the type, the subtype or the module
output: This report lists all the Messages Nodes not following the naming convention.
rationale:
The naming convention is mandatory in PeopleSoft to easily identify the added custom objects.
-Upgrade: allow to identify impacts on external objects
-Maintain: the search is used to find the potential objects
remediation: Rename the object using the correct naming convention and research all the references to this object using the old reference (use the functions 'find reference' and/or 'find in' in the Application Designer)
alternativeName: Naming convention prefix on Messages Nodes (PeopleSoft)

qualityStandards.name: Inconsistent Naming Conventions for Identifiers
qualityStandards.description: The product's code, documentation, or other artifacts do not consistently use the same naming conventions for variables, callables, groups of related callables, I/O capabilities, data types, file names, or similar types of elements.

parameters.name: PeopleSoft: Prefix for Messages Nodes
parameters.description: Naming convention prefix used to identify custom objects
